description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Experience the terror of being trapped in the Zombie Outhouse as you try to defend yourself for as long as possible.  Play through 25 levels acquiring 5 different weapons to help you survive.
description.short: Experience the terror of being trapped in the Zombie Outhouse as you try to defend yourself for as long as possible.  Play through 25 levels acquiring 5 different weapons to help you survive.
